video.title: The Originals
video.synopsis: The Mikaelsons move to New Orleans and form an alliance with local witches in an effort to rule the city once again in this "Vampire Diaries" spinoff.

episodes.synopsis: After centuries away, vampire-werewolf hybrid Klaus returns to the French Quarter of New Orleans to find it taken over by his former protégé, Marcel.
episodes.title: Always and Forever

episodes.synopsis: When Rebekah arrives in New Orleans at her brother Elijah's request, she worries that Klaus is up to no good and asks Sophie for help.
episodes.title: House of the Rising Son

episodes.synopsis: With the help of a reluctant Sophie, Klaus and Rebekah join forces to bring down Marcel's empire from within, despite Elijah's concerns.
episodes.title: Tangled Up in Blue

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah is determined to get to the bottom of a strange encounter with Elijah, while Marcel lets Davina out for a night at the music festival.
episodes.title: Girl in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Sophie reveals troubling secrets from her past, and Marcel asks Klaus to accompany him to the bayou after gruesome remains are discovered.
episodes.title: Sinners and Saints

episodes.synopsis: Klaus takes extreme measures to protect Hayley and their unborn child while Marcel seeks advice from an old friend and Davina works on her magic.
episodes.title: Fruit of the Poisoned Tree

episodes.synopsis: Despite their growing tensions, Klaus and Elijah seek Sabine's help to find a missing Hayley, while Marcel approaches Rebekah with an enticing offer.
episodes.title: Bloodletting

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah turns to Father Kieran for guidance, Elijah is troubled by his falling out with Klaus, and Marcel uncovers disturbing information.
episodes.title: The River in Reverse

episodes.synopsis: Cami is disturbed by what she learns of Klaus's past, while Hayley, Elijah and Rebekah investigate a plan to harm werewolves in the bayou.
episodes.title: Reigning Pain in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Elijah and Marcel form an unlikely alliance as Klaus takes steps to get Davina back, and Hayley is forced to make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: The Casket Girls

episodes.synopsis: Sophie approaches the others with some startling information about the Harvest Festival and presents a plan to save Davina, who is violently ill.
episodes.title: Après Moi, Le Déluge

episodes.synopsis: Marcel refuses to help Klaus when a gruesome discovery is made, and Rebekah recognizes the remnants of a sacrifice as the work of a dangerous warlock.
episodes.title: Dance Back from the Grave

episodes.synopsis: Father Kieran has a run-in with a witch from his past, while someone from Rebekah and Marcel's past threatens to expose their long-buried secrets.
episodes.title: Crescent City

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah is locked up in the sanatorium and discovers a revenge-seeking witch is back, and Elijah makes a decision that endangers Klaus and Rebekah.
episodes.title: Long Way Back from Hell

episodes.synopsis: Back in 1919, Klaus reveals details of a devastating secret, Elijah and Monique form an alliance, and Marcel and Rebekah scheme against the witches.
episodes.title: Le Grand Guignol

episodes.synopsis: Tensions build between Klaus, Elijah and Rebekah when they are trapped together in the City of the Dead cemetery by a witch's spell.
episodes.title: Farewell to Storyville

episodes.synopsis: Elijah makes a power-grabbing move after accusing Klaus of inaction, and the Mikaelsons throw an extravagant party in an attempt to bring peace.
episodes.title: Moon over Bourbon Street

episodes.synopsis: Elijah focuses on restoring the family home to its former glory, angering Klaus, who sets a new plan in motion using a werewolf from his own line.
episodes.title: The Big Uneasy

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah disagree about how to handle the Crescent Wolves, and a violent explosion in the bayou deepens the divide between the communities.
episodes.title: An Unblinking Death

episodes.synopsis: Hayley confronts a surprising enemy as she and her unborn baby fall into peril during a celebratory wake to honor a fallen member of the community.
episodes.title: A Closer Walk with Thee

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah enact a plan to change the fates of Hayley and the werewolf community, forcing Marcel to rally an army to regain control of the city.
episodes.title: The Battle of New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah search for Hayley as her due date nears, while Francesca meets with Oliver and Jackson about the werewolves' future in New Orleans.
episodes.title: From a Cradle to a Grave

episodes.synopsis: Klaus plots revenge against the werewolves controlling the French Quarter; Hayley mourns the loss of her daughter and struggles with her new status.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: Klaus prods Hayley to reclaim her rank in the pack; Elijah turns to a former friend; Davina and Kaleb face danger when uninvited guests arrive.
episodes.title: Alive and Kicking

episodes.synopsis: A new witch arrives; Elijah grudgingly teams up with a newly turned vampire; Esther reveals a shocking secret and unveils her plan for her children.
episodes.title: Every Mother's Son

episodes.synopsis: Davina takes Mikael to her family cabin to hide from Klaus; Hayley tries to stop Vincent from recruiting unsuspecting teens to build a werewolf army.
episodes.title: Live and Let Die

episodes.synopsis: Elijah relives a love affair from the distant past; Mikael takes Cami hostage; Davina makes a troubling discovery about Kaleb; Klaus and Mikael clash.
episodes.title: Red Door

episodes.synopsis: Esther blackmails Klaus; Oliver lands in danger, prompting Hayley to reconnect with Jackson; Klaus is surprised by a visitor from his past.
episodes.title: Wheel Inside the Wheel

episodes.synopsis: Klaus hunts for an antidote to help Elijah; Aiden, Hayley, Marcel, Cami and Josh team up to defeat Vincent; Kaleb takes Davina on a visit to his past.
episodes.title: Chasing the Devil's Tail

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah must forfeit her quiet life with baby Hope and return to life on the run; Hayley ponders a tremendous sacrifice; Davina turns to dark magic.
episodes.title: The Brothers That Care Forgot

episodes.synopsis: Elijah's odd behavior moves Rebekah to call a meeting that has repercussions; Cami demands answers from Vincent; Esther finds an unlikely ally.
episodes.title: The Map of Moments

episodes.synopsis: Hayley and Jackson try to enact a truce between the vampires and werewolves; Rebekah gets trapped inside an insane asylum; Klaus confronts Kaleb.
episodes.title: Gonna Set Your Flag on Fire

episodes.synopsis: Vincent creates a spell endowing him with power over his brothers; Davina chooses sides; Hayley and Jackson face extreme rituals before their wedding.
episodes.title: Brotherhood of the Damned

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious girl at the asylum intrigues Rebekah; Hayley and Jackson share sticky secrets; Klaus tries to stop Hayley and Jackson's marriage ritual.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Vincent gains ground, aided by a formidable figure from his past; Kaleb is forced into a life-or-death decision; Elijah faces the fight of his life.
episodes.title: The Devil Is Damned

episodes.synopsis: Hayley questions the ritual that will unite her with Jackson; Kaleb harbors a devastating secret; Cami makes a startling revelation about baby Hope.
episodes.title: I Love You, Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah learns of her body's checkered past; Elijah seeks a witch; Freya gets Finn to take her to the father she hasn't seen in over a thousand years.
episodes.title: They All Asked for You

episodes.synopsis: Klaus tests Freya's loyalties; Strange visions inform Rebekah that the body she inhabits wants to regain control; Jackson's frustrations grow.
episodes.title: Save My Soul

episodes.synopsis: Klaus must trust Freya to save Rebekah's life; Josephine discloses startling information; Marcel tries to enlist Vincent to help defeat Eva.
episodes.title: Exquisite Corpse

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to defeat Dahlia, Klaus faces another deadly threat; Josephine helps Elijah and Marcel prepare a safe house; Aiden is torn between allies.
episodes.title: Night Has a Thousand Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Dahlia gives Klaus and Hayley a deadline to turn over baby Hope; Hayley devises a risky plan; Freya issues Rebekah and Elijah an ultimatum.
episodes.title: When the Levee Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Dahlia plots to entice Klaus; Dahlia's deadline fosters tension and teamwork; Hayley faces a tough choice; Vincent makes Davina an intriguing offer.
episodes.title: City Beneath the Sea

episodes.synopsis: Betrayed by his siblings, Klaus sets his sights on revenge; A dangerous new threat hunts Marcel; Davina considers a life-altering offer.
episodes.title: Fire with Fire

episodes.synopsis: Klaus plans to protect baby Hope at all costs; Freya uses drastic means to ward off Dahlia; The Mikaelson siblings prime for the fight of their lives.
episodes.title: Ashes to Ashes

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of their showdown with Dahlia, the stakes are raised for the splintered Mikaelson clan. Meanwhile, a serial killer may be on the loose.
episodes.title: For the Next Millennium

episodes.synopsis: When Hayley doesn't show up during the full moon, Elijah and Jackson fear poachers. Klaus receives a dire prophecy about the future of the Mikaelsons.
episodes.title: You Hung the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah reunite to investigate Lucien's motives. Hayley copes using unusual methods. A mysterious figure has an offer for Marcel.
episodes.title: I'll See You in Hell or New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Elijah checks up on an old acquaintance at a gala thrown by a group of ancient vampires, where a mysterious woman approaches Marcel with an offer.
episodes.title: A Walk on the Wild Side

episodes.synopsis: Elijah suspects that Tristan is hiding something and enlists Marcel's help to uncover the truth. Klaus receives an unexpected visit.
episodes.title: The Axeman's Letter

episodes.synopsis: Elijah and Freya realize that Rebekah may be the target of the Strix's latest plan. Klaus spends time with Aurora to find out where her loyalties lie.
episodes.title: Beautiful Mistake

episodes.synopsis: With a dire prophecy looming over them, Klaus and Elijah invite Lucien, Tristan and Aurora to a Thanksgiving gathering, hoping to negotiate a truce.
episodes.title: Out of the Easy

episodes.synopsis: Klaus is forced to follow Aurora's devious clues to try to help Cami. Meanwhile, Elijah, Freya and Hayley take drastic measures against Tristan.
episodes.title: The Other Girl in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Freya attempts to reverse a crippling curse that may expose one of her siblings, even as she finds herself the target of the Strix's latest plan.
episodes.title: Savior

episodes.synopsis: Klaus declares war on Aurora and Tristan. Vincent must use his magic against his will. Hayley and Jackson become pawns in Tristan's twisted game.
episodes.title: A Ghost Along the Mississippi

episodes.synopsis: While Klaus deals with pressing matters at home, Elijah reluctantly aligns with Aya. Meanwhile, Davina is conflicted about an enticing offer.
episodes.title: Wild at Heart

episodes.synopsis: Klaus squares off with an unlikely foe to stop a powerful weapon from destroying his family. A fight for control of the Strix turns violent.
episodes.title: Dead Angels

episodes.synopsis: A vengeful Aurora sets a trap for the Mikaelson brothers, while Davina conjures up an ally who may hold the key to a lifesaving spell.
episodes.title: Heart Shaped Box

episodes.synopsis: When Klaus and Elijah become stuck in a magical trap, Freya enlists help to get them back. Aya and The Strix's coven of witches work on a risky spell.
episodes.title: A Streetcar Named Desire

episodes.synopsis: Klaus must deal with an ancient vampire who has a vendetta against him. Marcel turns to Davina for help after several Strix members go missing.
episodes.title: An Old Friend Calls

episodes.synopsis: Rumors about the last remaining white oak bullet draw Klaus's enemies to New Orleans. At the compound, Kol confronts a face from his past.
episodes.title: Alone with Everybody

episodes.synopsis: While the feuding Mikaelson brothers team up against a new threat, Klaus and Hayley try to figure out Lucien's agenda. Davina worries about Kol.
episodes.title: Behind the Black Horizon

episodes.synopsis: As Klaus's foes close in, Elijah and Freya come up against a powerful force. Davina seeks Marcel and Vincent's help as Kol's behavior worsens.
episodes.title: The Devil Comes Here and Sighs

episodes.synopsis: Klaus mounts a rescue effort with the help of his family and allies, while Davina receives some life-changing news.
episodes.title: No More Heartbreaks

episodes.synopsis: Klaus, Elijah and Freya desperately search for a way to take down Lucien, but an urgent plea for help forces them to put their efforts on hold.
episodes.title: Where Nothing Stays Buried

episodes.synopsis: Freya's visions reveal that her family will soon face a dangerous new enemy. Vincent and Kol travel to the ancestral world to face the witches.
episodes.title: Give 'Em Hell Kid

episodes.synopsis: Klaus's enemies arrive in New Orleans, and he stands trial for centuries of bloodshed. Meanwhile, Marcel receives an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: The Bloody Crown

episodes.synopsis: After five quiet years, Klaus's old enemies swoop into town, threatening the vampire-witch truce. To cure the Mikaelsons, Hayley acts on a dicey tip.
episodes.title: Gather Up the Killers

episodes.synopsis: Elijah's crew ramps up the search for Klaus, as the imprisoned Klaus battles his inner demons. Marcel learns about Hayley's quest for the venom cure.
episodes.title: No Quarter

episodes.synopsis: As Klaus bonds with Hope, his siblings debate their future. Vincent, disturbed by new abductions, tells Marcel about his past with sacrificial magic.
episodes.title: Haunter of Ruins

episodes.synopsis: Hayley brings Hope to Vincent, whose curative spell leads to a revelation about the abductions. Now allied, Freya and Keelin plot to rob Marcel.
episodes.title: Keepers of the House

episodes.synopsis: Haunted by dark visions, Klaus and Marcel struggle to resist The Hollow, while Freya readies her purifying potion and Hayley seeks help from Mary.
episodes.title: I Hear You Knocking

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to expose The Hollow's allies, the Mikaelsons host a lavish party in the Quarter, while Hayley uses Freya's magic to find answers in the past.
episodes.title: Bag of Cobras

episodes.synopsis: While Freya casts a spell to protect her family from The Hollow's servant, Elijah pressures Vincent to attack The Hollow through a dangerous ritual.
episodes.title: High Water and a Devil's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Guided by an old foe, Klaus and Hayley go to the ancestral world for help with The Hollow, while Marcel and Elijah team up to find the missing bones.
episodes.title: Voodoo in My Blood

episodes.synopsis: While The Hollow, in Sofya's body, holds the wounded Elijah captive, Vincent and Marcel plot ways to kill the spirit before it becomes unstoppable.
episodes.title: Queen Death

episodes.synopsis: As Freya attempts to revive Elijah by entering his subconscious through a spell, Marcel tracks down The Hollow, whose blood he needs to save Sofya.
episodes.title: Phantomesque

episodes.synopsis: Kol must choose between lover Davina, whose new life depends on The Hollow, and his family, who must sacrifice The Hollow to free Elijah's soul.
episodes.title: A Spirit Here That Won't Be Broken

episodes.synopsis: After Sofya reveals that The Hollow is alive, Vincent casts a spell to learn the secret to killing her, while the Mikaelsons revise their exit plans.
episodes.title: Voodoo Child

episodes.synopsis: To save Hope from The Hollow, the Mikaelsons agree to Vincent's blood sacrifice, even though it requires they live separate lives for eternity.
episodes.title: The Feast of All Sinners

episodes.synopsis: Hope gets suspended. Caroline confronts Klaus about his violent actions. Elijah is missed by his siblings. Marcel asks Rebekah an important question.
episodes.title: Where You Left Your Heart

episodes.synopsis: Klaus searches for Hayley and is surprised by what he discovers. Marcel seeks justice on behalf of the vampires. Vincent looks for answers.
episodes.title: One Wrong Turn on Bourbon

episodes.synopsis: Elijah relearns how to be a vampire with the help of a woman named Antoinette and must decide what he wants to know about his past.
episodes.title: Ne Me Quitte Pas

episodes.synopsis: Klaus puts pressure on the three New Orleans supernatural factions as he searches for Hayley. Freya visits Hope at Mystic Falls.
episodes.title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea

episodes.synopsis: Hayley's kidnappers make a demand. Klaus remembers hatred he's experienced in the past. Antoinette has an unexpected revelation for Elijah.
episodes.title: Don't It Just Break Your Heart

episodes.synopsis: Greta pits Elijah and Klaus against each other as Roman follows his mother's wishes and brings Hope to Shiloh Place.
episodes.title: What, Will, I, Have, Left

episodes.synopsis: The supernatural factions of New Orleans grieve. Ivy discovers troubling news about the magic separating the Mikaelsons. Elijah offers up a deal.
episodes.title: God's Gonna Trouble the Water

episodes.synopsis: The Mikaelson siblings are finally reunited. Trapped in a chambre de chasse together, they must help Elijah face his memories in order to get free.
episodes.title: The Kindness of Strangers

episodes.synopsis: Klaus worries about Hope, whose powers threaten to overwhelm her. Declan demands answers from Elijah about Hayley. The vampire purists attack.
episodes.title: We Have Not Long to Love

episodes.synopsis: Klaus uses unconventional parenting measures to help Hope. Antoinette asks Elijah for help. Declan worries about his sanity. Vincent grieves.
episodes.title: There in the Disappearing Light

episodes.synopsis: Freya confesses something to Keelin that could threaten their special day. Elijah reminisces. Klaus asks Davina for help with Hope.
episodes.title: 'Til the Day I Die

episodes.synopsis: With a full moon on the horizon and the dark magic threatening to overtake Hope, Klaus concocts a new plan with Caroline in Mystic Falls.
episodes.title: The Tale of Two Wolves

episodes.synopsis: Klaus tries to fight off the darkness inside him as his loved ones grapple with how to support their complicated brother, friend and father.
episodes.title: When the Saints Go Marching In
